level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If a provision of this chapter or its application to a particular person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity does not affect other persons or applications.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 12 of Digital Inclusion Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-467, July 25, 2006, 53 DCR 6754).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-210
level.text: For Law 16-210, see notes following ยง 34-1731.01.
